channel.title: This one impossible error to fix is really annoying! help!
channel.description:
client.java:9495: 'else' without 'if' else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("startmine2")) ^ 1 error Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3230
MY GOD IVE TRIED EVERYTHING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: This one impossible error to fix is really annoying! help!
item.dc:creator: @kennyboy93 kennyboy93
item.description:
@kennyboy93 wrote:

well
as long as you use if for the commands, not else if, then youll be fine

Read full topic

item.title: This one impossible error to fix is really annoying! help!
item.dc:creator: @darvald darvald
item.description:
@darvald wrote:

pff why all that silly things… jsut do this open up your cleint .java and press cntrl+f and find

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“startmine3”)

then u see somtin like this else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“startmine3”))
{
teleportToX = ;
teleportToY = ;
inwildy = true;
sendMessage(’’");
sendMessage("")
}

delete all that and your done

Read full topic
item.source: This one impossible error to fix is really annoying! help!

item.title: This one impossible error to fix is really annoying! help!
item.dc:creator: @kennyboy93 kennyboy93
item.description:
@kennyboy93 wrote:

[quote=“CrazyCracker, post:3, topic:16051”]ok fine ill take the if away from the else this is wat i get!!!

client.java:9495: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“startmine2”))
^
NPCHandler.java:217: ‘else’ without ‘if’
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Type ::saveme to get to varrock!”; else if (npcs[i].IsDea
== true) {
^
NPCHandler.java:276: illegal start of expression
public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:348: illegal start of expression
public void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPCID

    ^

NPCHandler.java:625: illegal start of expression
public static int worldmap2[][] = {
^
NPCHandler.java:634: illegal start of expression
public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn’t remove - xerozchee

^
NPCHandler.java:635: illegal start of expression
public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2};
^
NPCHandler.java:637: illegal start of expression
public static int randomremoveschaos()
^
NPCHandler.java:975: ‘;’ expected
}
^
NPCHandler.java:976: ‘}’ expected
^
10 errors
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3424[/quote]

you see, the problem with what you did is that youre not meant to take away the if
youre meant to take away the else

Read full topic

== true) {
